text: Pokrovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Naumovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 562 as of 2010. == Geography == It is located 10 km from Sterlitamak, 3 km from Naumovka. == References == Category:Rural localities in Sterlitamaksky District
title: Pokrovka, Naumovsky Selsoviet, Sterlitamaksky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
